definitions: Exerts force on (someone or something) in order to move them away from oneself or the origin of the force.
Moves oneself or is moved in a specified direction by exerting force.
Promotes the use, sale, or adoption of (something).
Urges or forces (someone) to do something.
Extends to a specified limit or degree.
examples: The company pushes its new product.
The river pushes against the banks.
The artist pushes the boundaries of design.
